name: Hunt Props -Mobile TPS Shooter
description:
Hunt for props is a new multiplayer mobile shooter game where you play as a hunter and a prop.
Team up with other online players or play together with your friends in online public matches.
Or invite them to a custom match where you can play against them.

Hide from the hunters as a prop in any places and corners of the map.
Swap to new objects in order to blend into your surroundings.
Try to escape from the enemy players and be the last prop standing when the time runs out.

Become a soldier and hunt for the players who tries to escape from you by acting as innocent fake objects in the map. Find and kill all props before the time runs out and secure the victory for your team.
